      • createSprite

        public VGDLSprite createSprite(SpriteContent content,
                      Vector2d position,
                      java.awt.Dimension dim)
        Creates a new sprite with a given dimension in a certain position. Parameters are passed as SpriteContent.
        Parameters:
        content - parameters for the sprite, including its class.
        position - position of the object.
        dim - dimensions of the sprite on the world.
        Returns:
        the new sprite, created and initialized, ready for play!

      • createEffect

        public Effect createEffect(InteractionContent content)
        Creates a new effect, with parameters passed as InteractionContent.
        Parameters:
        content - parameters for the effect, including its class.
        Returns:
        the new effect, created and initialized, ready to be triggered!

      • createTermination

        public Termination createTermination(TerminationContent content)
        Creates a new termination, with parameters passed as TerminationContent.
        Parameters:
        content - parameters for the termination condition, including its class.
        Returns:
        the new termination, created and initialized, ready to be checked!

      • parseParameters

        public void parseParameters(Content content,
                   java.lang.Object obj)
        Parses the parameters from content, assigns them to variables in obj.
        Parameters:
        content - contains the parameters to read.
        obj - object with the variables to assign.

      • requestFieldValueInt

        public int requestFieldValueInt(java.lang.Object obj,
                       java.lang.String fieldName)
        Returns the value of an int field in the object specified
        Parameters:
        obj - object that holds the field.
        fieldName - name of the field to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the value, or -1 if the parameter does not exist or it is not an int.
